root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 3-2-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: The indicator is available at national level, province, Place of residence (Total; Girls; Boys; 0-11 months; 12-23 months; 24-59 months)
L'indicateur est disponible au niveau national, province, Milieu de résidence (Total; Filles; Garçons; 0-11 mois; 12-23 mois; 24-59 mois)
